data.title: Ghost Hunters
data.meta_description: In the SciFi channel's sometimes-spooky reality showÂ Ghost Hunters, a team of investigators looks into hauntings and other paranormal happenings. By dâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Altoona Tantrum

Series Premiere - The Ghost Hunters team travels to Altoona, Pennsylvania to investigate a reported haunting in a young girl's bedroom.

41 min Â· Oct 6, 2004 TV-PG

EPISODE 2

Mishler Theatre

Leaving no haunting uninvestigated in their trip to Altoona, Pennsylvania; the Ghost Hunters team explores alleged hauntings in a historic theatre and railroad museum.

40 min Â· Oct 13, 2004 TV-PG

EPISODE 4

Race Rock Lighthouse

In a story you'll see only on Ghost Hunters, the U.S. Coast Guard, in an effort to put wicked legends to rest, asks the team to check out a haunted lighthouse.

40 min Â· Oct 27, 2004 TV-PG

EPISODE 5

Eastern State Penitentiary

The Ghost Hunters team moves their investigation behind bars, going after a spirit that notoriously spooked an incarcerated Al Capone.

40 min Â· Nov 3, 2004 TV-PG
